fields.description:
When running an alloy app in debug mode breakpoints are always completely ignored.

However, when running the same app and putting breakpoints in the compiled code (Resources folder) they work.... but for debugging purposes it is important to be able to debug properly in the written code, instead of the compiled code
fields.summary: Breakpoints in Alloy are ignored completely
fields.environment:
iOS/Android on MacOS using any TiSDK (tested with 6.0.4, 6.3.0 and 7.0)
Studio versions tested on: 4.10.0.201709271713 & 5.0.0.201712081732 (but older versions haven't worked in at least the past year)
Tested on CLI version 6.3.0 and 7.0.0

comments.body: The iOS part is fixed as of Studio 5.1.0 (see TISTUD-8966). The remaining work is discussed in ALOY-1606. Thanks!
